[[quartz]]
= Quartz

[.badges]
[.badge-key]##Since Camel Quarkus##[.badge-version]##1.0.0-M6## [.badge-key]##JVM##[.badge-supported]##supported## [.badge-key]##Native##[.badge-supported]##supported##

Schedule sending of messages using the Quartz 2.x scheduler.

== What's inside

* https://camel.apache.org/components/latest/quartz-component.html[Quartz component], URI syntax: `quartz:groupName/triggerName`

Please refer to the above link for usage and configuration details.

== Maven coordinates

[source,xml]
----
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.camel.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>camel-quarkus-quartz</artifactId>
</dependency>
----

Check the xref:user-guide/index.adoc[User guide] for more information about writing Camel Quarkus applications.
